Lê Vũ Bằng - Master in Banking & Finance 
of CFVG, France. 
DOB: July 30th 1984.  
Add: E16 Road 4, Tân Sơn Nhì Ward, Tân Phú 
District, Hồ Chí Minh, Việt Nam 
MB:  
Email:  
CAREER OBJECTIVE 
Vision: to be a business leader of a global corporation. 
Mission: to be a kind person, to have a decent family, to contribute on business, to share 
and develop others.  
HONORS AND AWARDS 
Winning Best employee prize in 2015, 2018 at Sacombank 
Winning Star of the Year 2010, British American Tobacco  
Jul 2009 - Jun 2010, wining scholarship from Institute of Potential Leader (IPL) 
Get a scholarship of a leadership & business training course for 9 months, from Institute of 
Potential Leader (IPL) Program, established by the first-rate VN business community & top 
leading Vietnamese scholars & operated by PACE Education Organization 
For more information, please vist http://www.ipl.edu.vn/  
Oct 2006, wining bronze prize in Lighting Young Business Talent Competition - organized by 
VTV3 & Viet Nam Young Entrepreneurs Organization in Ha Noi. 
WORKING EXPERIENCE 
March 2011 – Present, Sacombank, Product Manager of Service & Wealth Management Product 
 
Managing product line from strategy into action of international banking remittance 
service by coordinating the planning/forecasting process. 
 
Being a key member of Sacombank in Due Diligence & world-wide customer 
management team with international partners to develop & deploy service products 
(of internation payment & inward remittance). 
 
Project leader of building product project, including managing & defining requirement, 
buling solution, SRS, UAT, pilot & launching term, focus on API, CRM, T24 Core 
banking, Fee Core…. project.  
 
Develop and manage policy of Wealth management and behavior insight of VVIP.  
 
Driving a solution & Advisory of Portfolio strategy through market requirements 
includes product price, market size, share & demand... 
 
Designing and implement new launched product knowledge training & product 
refreshing training for Sale Forces & Marketing Teams 
 
Monitoring & Analysing the progress of product financial indicators by reports on 
operations and activities, recommending improvements and modifications. 
2 
 
Planing & implement promotion/activity/campaign in Sacombank nationwide’s system 
for delivering target.  
 
Exploiting customer data warehouse/market survey to improve services frequently. 
Sep 2009 – Mar 2011, British American Tobacco (BAT) Vietnam, Senoir Trade Marketing 
Executive 
 
Develop & Implement & Evaluate the Channel Marketing Plan to maximize Visibility, 
Off-take Volume by effectively aligning all critical elements of marketing mix to 
achieve the business objectives in strategic Convenience Channel. 
 
Plan & Implement Consumer Engagement Activities and Promotion Programs across 
all regions with optimum use of resources and materials in order to achieve 
Convenience and brand communication objectives. 
 
Maintain a Comprehensive Database of the strategic channels, Competitors’ 
Campaigns in respective region and ensure the appropriate re-action to drive the 
business results. 
 
Negotiate and Management Customized Trading Terms, distribution commitments and 
marketing services among the Convenience a based on specific needs of the 
customers in order to optimize availability, volume and share growth opportunities 
 
Drive continuous improvement in Convenience channel activities and merchandising 
executions in order to keep strong Brand Awareness and increased Off-take & Share 
of Voice. 
Mar 2008 – Aug 2009, Supply Planning Assistant Manager, Unilever JV Viet Nam   
 
MPS creation/adjustment by SAP and BPCS (ERP Systems) aligned with finish goods 
stock/Sales report/Forecast/ Category Key Performance Indicators management policy 
and materials status to achieve optimum category performance. 
 
Implement national Distribution Planning with effective cost to fulfill market demand 
and align with inventory management strategy. 
 
Balance Market Demand (company strategy, sales plan, promotion plan, launch/re-
launch project) and Supplied Capacity (factory issues, material, and labor) and risk 
management to ensure FGs available on time. 
 
Pre-SOP (Sales and Operation Planning) Report, to analyze & create the balance of 
market demand vs. production capacity and propose solutions in constraint period. 
 
Cooperation with 3rd-Parties factories as leading position to ensure production plan 
delivery, Stock-take management, Balance Sheet at monthly closing period & Delivery 
Plan 
 
Material inventory management by managing Purchase Order/Stock Level/Delivery 
Schedule/Forecast to align with company 
guideline (stock policy, inventory 
management strategy). 
 
To be a connection of Supply Team (Manufacturing) & Business Team in management 
supplied information and market demand. 
Aug 2006 to Mar 2008, Supply Planning Officer, Unilever JV Viet Nam   
 
Plan to supply finish goods for national distribution centers 
 
Manage 3rd party in priority for production plan, stock-take, monthly closing data & 
transferring plan after production 
 
Maintain stock policy & suggest options in risky status 
SKILLS 
 
Analysing, Planning, Communication, Negotiation, Presentation, Project Management  
3 
 
English: Advance level - Fluently both verbal & writing.  
Computer: Proficiecy in Excel, Word, Power Point & exprierience in other Business 
Solutions (i.e. SAP, Oracle BI, Terminos T24, BPCS,…) 
 
EDUCATION BASIS 
 
Oct 2013 – Oct 2015: Master in Banking & Finance of CFVG Institute, France 
 
Jul 2009 - Jun 2015: Scholarship from Institute of Potential Leader (IPL), 
including 9 months education at PACE Institute of Directors & 5 years implementation 
& records. 
 
Sep 2002 – Apr 2007: Engineer of HCMC University of Technology, major in 
Industrial & System Engineering (Supply Chain Development, Optimization production 
system) 
AND MISCELLANIOUS  
 
Feb 2018: Cerficate of Leadership skill 
 
Feb 2017 Certificate of Coaching Skill 
 
Feb 2015: Certificate of Company Valuation, Sacombank 
 
Oct 2013: Certificate of Project Management skills by ERC Training 
 
May 2012: Certificate of Cooporate Restructuring & Re-engineering by BDSC 
Institude 
 
Jan 2012: Certificate of Emotional Excellence for Innovative Leadership, by IDT 
 
Nov 2011: Certificate of Finance Report Analysis, Sacombank 
 
Nov 2010: Certificate of Selling Excellence, from Direct Sales Institute, BAT. 
 
Jan 2010: Certificate of Negotiation Skills, from Lead Training Education Center. 
 
Aug 2009: Certificate of Safety System for Supervisor, from Dupon Corp. 
 
Nov 2008: Certificate of Communication Skills, from Lead Training Education Center. 
 
Dec 2007: Certificate of Influencing Skills, from CTS Training Center. 
 
Aug 2007: Certificate of Basic Coaching Skills, from Lead Training Education Center
